titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief for the conversion of cooperative housing corporations into condominiums.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/25/2001--Introduced. Revises Internal Revenue Code provisions concerning distributions by cooperative housing corporations to provide that: (1) no gain or loss shall be recognized to a cooperative housing corporation on the distribution by such corporation of a dwelling unit to a stockholder in exchange for the stockholder's stock (in such corporation); and (2) no gain or loss shall be recognized to the stockholder as a result of such exchange.
